alert.note: Alert for Abbeville; Anderson; Greenville; Laurens (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 25 at 6:20PM EDT until June 25 at 6:45PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: The National Weather Service in Greenville-Spartanburg has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Laurens County in Upstate South Carolina... South central Greenville County in Upstate South Carolina... East central Anderson County in Upstate South Carolina... Northeastern Abbeville County in Upstate South Carolina... * Until 645 PM EDT. * At 619 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 15 miles east of Anderson, or 5 miles north of Honea Path, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Honea Path, Donalds, Princeton, Hickory Tavern, Shoals Junction, Belton and Ware Shoals. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report damaging winds, hail, or flooding to the National Weather Service by calling toll free, 1, 800, 2 6 7, 8 1 0 1, or by posting on our Facebook page, or Tweet it using hashtag nwsgsp. Your message should describe the event and the specific location where it occurred.
